scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of 15 items, ca. 1861-1866 and 1959-1972, pertaining to Henry Hotze(1834-1887), Confederate propagandist. The writings chiefly concern Hotze's views on the conflict between the North and the South, particularly the effects on the Confederate states, and also contain views on the Mexican Expedition.
